item.title: Run MariaDB using Private Registry
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Deploy MariaDB from private Docker registry KubeDB operator supports using private Docker registry. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run MariaDB database using private Docker images. Before You Begin Read concept of MariaDB Version Catalog to learn detail concepts of MariaDBVersion object. You need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
